title: Dyer's Record Book, 1866–67
inscribed: Label on cover reads:  "DELAINS FOR 1866 AND 1867 /DEC. 20th / 66".
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles.  Book contains 236 samples in various designs and brilliant colors.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dyer's Record Book, 1866–67.
1866–67. Medium: cardboard, paper, cotton. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-14.
